poem:
**Diplomatic Conversations**  

In the White House glow,  
Trump and Merz confer:  
a world in disarray.  

Unhappy voices echo  
in polished halls—  
a quiet storm of unrest.  

Words sharpened,  
like morning ice,  
where decisions weave  
through headlines as  
fragile as glass.  

Underneath,  
silent currents speak—  
a dance of nations,  
poised and uncertain.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Donald Trump says he and Friedrich Merz are ‘unhappy’ about Russian invasion of Ukraine at White House meeting – Europe live 6.00pm BST Merz meets Trump after 'historic' Nato decisions in Brussels - day so far The German chancellor, Friedrich Merz, is meeting the US president, Donald Trump, at the White House this evening for talks on Ukraine and Russia, and trade, among other things (17:41). Trump said the pair was “unhappy” about the state". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Donald Trump says he and Friedrich Merz are ‘unhappy’ about Russian invasion of Ukraine at White House meeting – Europe live 6.00pm BST Merz meets Trump after 'historic' Nato decisions in Brussels - day so far The German chancellor, Friedrich Merz, is meeting the US president, Donald Trump, at the White House this evening for talks on Ukraine and Russia, and trade, among other things (17:41). Trump said the pair was “unhappy” about the state
